content.rendered:
Accountant | Tulsa, Oklahoma   Paraprofessional Accounting Services
  • QuickBooks Software experience
  • Strong Customer Service experience
  • Client interaction
  • Multitasking & detail oriented a must
  • High Integrity, work ethic, commitment
  • No degree required
  • Health Care accounting experience preferred
